attributes.action: All candidates must be a resident and have been a resident in the constituency for a minimum of 1 term of parliament
attributes.additional_details: in order to reduce taxes being used unnecessarily to fund second houses, new rules should be made as soon as possible to ensure that only residents who have resided in a constituency for a minimum a term of parliament [ie.5yrs] are allowed to stand for election, and NO none residents must be allowed to stand.
